Package com.jcabi.w3c

W3C validators.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValidationResponse
    Response of HTML or CSS validation.
    Validator
    Validator of CSS pages through W3C validation API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Defect
    Validation defect (error or warning) produced by ValidationResponse.
    ValidatorBuilder
    Builder of HTML and CSS validators.

Package com.jcabi.w3c Description

W3C validators.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at w3c.jcabi.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.jcabi</groupId>
   <artifactId>jcabi-w3c</artifactId>
 </dependency>

1.0
